00027 namespace Filter {
00028   template<typename T>
00029   class Base : private boost::noncopyable {
00030   public:
00031     typedef typename boost::shared_ptr<Base<T> > sptr;
00032     virtual ~Base() {}
00033     virtual void init(boost::posix_time::ptime t, const T& x) = 0;
00034     virtual const T& update(boost::posix_time::ptime t, const T& x) = 0 ;
00035     virtual const T& x() const = 0;
00036     virtual bool isInEquilibrium() const = 0;    
00037   } ;
00038 
00039   template<typename T>
00040   class LowPassBase : public Base<T> {
00041   public:
00042     typedef typename boost::shared_ptr<LowPassBase<T> > sptr;
00043     LowPassBase(double dt, double lambda)
00044       : dt_(dt)
00045       , lambda_(lambda)
00046       , a_(dt_/lambda_) {}
00047     virtual ~LowPassBase() {}
00048 
00049     using Base<T>::update;
00050     using Base<T>::x;
00051 
00052     virtual void init(boost::posix_time::ptime t, const T& x0) {
00053       t0_ = t_ = t;
00054       x_  = x0;
00055     }
00056     double dt() const { return dt_; }
00057     double lambda() const { return lambda_; }
00058 
00059     virtual bool isInEquilibrium() const { 
00060       using namespace boost::posix_time;
00061       return (t_ - t0_) > time_duration(0,0,0, boost::int64_t(2*lambda_*time_duration::ticks_per_second()));
00062     }
00063   protected:
00064     double dt_;
00065     double lambda_;
00066     double a_;
00067     T x_;
00068     boost::posix_time::ptime t0_; // filter start time
00069     boost::posix_time::ptime t_;  // current filter time
00070   } ;
00071 
00072   template<typename T>
00073   class LowPass : public LowPassBase<T> {
00074   public:
00075     typedef boost::shared_ptr<LowPass<T> > sptr;
00076     LowPass(double dt, double lambda)
00077       : LowPassBase<T>(dt, lambda) {}
00078     virtual ~LowPass() {}
00079 
00080     static typename Base<T>::sptr make(double dt, double lambda) {
00081       return typename Base<T>::sptr(new LowPass(dt, lambda));
00082     }
00083     virtual const T& x() const { return x_; }
00084     virtual const T& update(boost::posix_time::ptime pt, const T& xx) {
00085       using namespace boost::posix_time;
00086       const double dt(double((pt-t_).ticks()) / double(time_duration::ticks_per_second()));
00087       t_ = pt;
00088       a_ = dt / lambda_;
00089       x_ *= (1-a_); x_ += a_*xx;
00090       // std::cout << "Filter::Update " << dt << " " << a_<< std::endl;
00091       return x();
00092     }
00093   private:
00094     using LowPassBase<T>::x_;
00095     using LowPassBase<T>::a_;
00096     using LowPassBase<T>::t_;
00097     using LowPassBase<T>::lambda_;
00098   } ;
00099 
00100   class PTimeLowPass : public LowPassBase<boost::posix_time::ptime> {
00101   public:
00102     typedef boost::shared_ptr<PTimeLowPass> sptr;
00103     PTimeLowPass(double dt, double lambda)
00104       : LowPassBase<boost::posix_time::ptime>(dt, lambda)
00105       , secondsInDay_(0) {}
00106     virtual ~PTimeLowPass() {}
00107 
00108     static Base<boost::posix_time::ptime>::sptr make(double dt, double lambda) {
00109       return Base<boost::posix_time::ptime>::sptr(new PTimeLowPass(dt, lambda));
00110     }
00111 
00112     virtual void init(boost::posix_time::ptime t0,
00113                       const boost::posix_time::ptime& t) {
00114       using namespace boost::posix_time;
00115       // compensation for the filter delay
00116       const ptime tCorr(t - time_duration(0,0,0, boost::int64_t((lambda_-dt_)*time_duration::ticks_per_second())));
00117       LowPassBase<ptime>::init(t0,tCorr);
00118       secondsInDay_ = 1e-6*tCorr.time_of_day().total_microseconds();
00119     }        
00120     virtual const boost::posix_time::ptime& update(boost::posix_time::ptime , 
00121                                                    const boost::posix_time::ptime& pt) {
00122       return this->update(pt);
00123     }
00124     const boost::posix_time::ptime& update(boost::posix_time::ptime pt)  {
00125       t_ = pt;
00126       using namespace boost::posix_time;
00127       // filter input: seconds in day
00128       const double xNew(double(pt.time_of_day().ticks()) / double(time_duration::ticks_per_second()));
00129       double xp = (1.-a_) * (secondsInDay_ - rollOverOffset(secondsInDay_-xNew)) + a_ * xNew;
00130       xp = (xp < 0)        ? xp + 24*3600 : xp;
00131       xp = (xp >= 24*3600) ? xp - 24*3600 : xp;
00132       // update filter state
00133       // 1. compute the filter time corrected for day rollover _relative to ptime_
00134       const double tt(xp - rollOverOffset(xp-secondsInDay_));
00135       x_ = ptime(x_.date()) + time_duration(0,0,0, boost::int64_t(tt*time_duration::ticks_per_second()));
00136       // 2. update seconds in day
00137       secondsInDay_ = xp;
00138       return this->x();
00139     }    
00140     virtual const boost::posix_time::ptime& x() const { 
00141       using namespace boost::posix_time;
00142       // compensate for filter delay
00143       t_ = x_ + time_duration(0,0,0, boost::int64_t((lambda_-dt_)*time_duration::ticks_per_second()));
00144       return t_;
00145     }
00146   private:  
00147     static double rollOverOffset(double dt) {
00148       if (dt >  12*3600) return  24*3600;
00149       if (dt < -12*3600) return -24*3600;
00150       return 0;
00151     }    
00152     double secondsInDay_;  // filter state 
00153     mutable boost::posix_time::ptime t_; //
00154   } ;
00155 
00156   template<typename T,
00157            template<class > class VECTOR>
00158   class WithRMS : Base<VECTOR<T> > {
00159   public:
00160     typedef  VECTOR<T> vector_type;
00161     WithRMS(typename Base<vector_type>::sptr filterX,
00162             typename Base<vector_type>::sptr filterRMS,
00163             const T& initRMS)
00164       : filterX_(filterX)
00165       , filterRMS_(filterRMS)
00166       , initRMS_(initRMS) {}
00167     virtual ~WithRMS() {}
00168 
00169     virtual void init(boost::posix_time::ptime pt, const vector_type& x) {
00170       filterX_->init(pt, x);
00171       const vector_type rms2(x.fmin(), x.fmax(), x.size(), initRMS_*initRMS_);
00172       filterRMS_->init(pt, rms2);
00173     }
00174     virtual const vector_type& update(boost::posix_time::ptime pt, const vector_type& x) {
00175       const vector_type& res(filterX_->update(pt, x));
00176       filterRMS_->update(pt, (x-res)*(x-res));
00177       return res;
00178     }
00179     virtual const vector_type& x() const   { return filterX_->x(); }
00180     virtual vector_type rms() const { return sqrt(filterRMS_->x()); }
00181     virtual bool isInEquilibrium() const {
00182       if (filterX_ == 0 || filterRMS_ == 0)
00183         return false;
00184       return filterX_->isInEquilibrium() && filterRMS_->isInEquilibrium();
00185     }
00186 
00187   protected:
00188   private:
00189     typename Base<vector_type>::sptr filterX_;
00190     typename Base<vector_type>::sptr filterRMS_;
00191     T initRMS_;
00192   } ;
00193 
00194   template<typename T>
00195   class Cascaded : Base<T> {
00196   public:
00197     Cascaded() {}
00198     virtual ~Cascaded() {}
00199 
00200     void add(typename Base<T>::sptr fp) {
00201       filters_.push_back(fp);
00202     }
00203     virtual void init(boost::posix_time::ptime pt, const T& x) {
00204       x_= x;
00205       BOOST_FOREACH(typename Base<T>::sptr filter, filters_)
00206         filter->init(pt, x);
00207     }
00208     virtual const T& update(boost::posix_time::ptime pt, const T& x) {
00209       x_= x;
00210       BOOST_FOREACH(typename Base<T>::sptr filter, filters_)
00211         x_ = filter->update(pt, x_);
00212       return x_;
00213     }
00214     virtual const T& x() const {
00215       return filters_.empty() ? x_ : filters_.back()->x();
00216     }
00217     virtual bool isInEquilibrium() const {
00218       BOOST_FOREACH(typename Base<T>::sptr filter, filters_)
00219         if (not filter->isInEquilibrium()) return false;
00220       return true;
00221     }
00222   private:
00223     std::vector<typename Base<T>::sptr> filters_;
00224     T x_;
00225   } ;
00226 }
